import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-food-item', templateUrl: './admin-food-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-food-item.component.css'] }) export class AdminFoodItemComponent { addform: FormGroup; this.addform = this.formBuilder.group({ restaurantId: ['', Validators.required], itemId: ['', Validators.required], description: ['', Validators.required], itemName: ['', Validators.required], imageUrl: ['', Validators.required], price: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.min(0)]] }); } addfoodItem(){ } }
